attributes.additional_details:
Sanctions on Zimbabwe are not approved by the UN and other than the travel ban mainly affect local british business interests- financial sanctions affect those with british bank accounts. because it gives the impression that government does not wish to do business with Zimbabwe former british interests and assets are being snapped up by other countries.
Britain should return the 100 million currently being used playing opposition politics in Zimbabwe and for anti government propaganda/local terrorism and close the budget for propaganda against Zimbabwe allocated to the BBC - All ffunds redirected to social servivces in Britain..
